#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>

int *tailtable,*a;

int ceilindex(int l,int r,int key)
{
    int m;
    while(r-l>1)
    {
        m=l+(r-l)/2;
        (tailtable[m]>key?r:l)=m;
    }
    return r;
}

int LIS(int n)
{
    tailtable=(int *)malloc(sizeof(int)*n);
    memset(tailtable,0,sizeof(int)*n);
    int len=1;
    tailtable[0]=a[0];

    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    if(a[i]<tailtable[0])
    tailtable[0]=a[i];
    else if(a[i]>=tailtable[len-1])
    tailtable[len++]=a[i];
    else
    tailtable[ceilindex(-1,len-1,a[i])]=a[i];

    free(tailtable);
    return len;
}

int main()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	a=(int *)malloc(sizeof(int)*n);
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	scanf("%d",&a[i]);
	printf("%d\n",LIS(n));
}
